What book is The movie Beaches based on?

The movieBeaches is based on the bookBeacheswritten byÂ  Iris R. Dart

Beaches(A Novel)Published by Zondervan - 10/13/2009

Loudmouthed, redheaded Cee Cee Bloom has her sights set on Hollywood. Bertie White, quiet and conservative, dreams of getting married and having children. In 1951, their childhood worlds collide in Atlantic City. Keeping in touch as pen pals, they reunite over the years ... always near the ocean. Powerful and moving, this novel follows Cee Cee and Bertie's extraordinary friendship over the course of thirty years as they transform from adolescents into adults. A bestselling novel that became a hugely successful film, Beaches is funny, heartbreaking, and a tale that should be a part of every woman's library.

Related books / From the author(s)

Beaches

written byIris R. Dart

Published by Zondervan - 10/13/2009

Loudmouthed, redheaded Cee Cee Bloom has her sights set on Hollywood. Bertie White, quiet and conservative, dreams of getting married and having children. In 1951, their childhood worlds collide in Atlantic City. Keeping in touch as pen pals, they reunite over the years ... always near the ocean. Powerful and moving, this novel follows Cee Cee and Bertie's extraordinary friendship over the course of thirty years as they transform from adolescents into adults. A bestselling novel that became a hugely successful film, Beaches is funny, heartbreaking, and a tale that should be a part of every woman's library.

Beaches II

written byIris Rainer Dart

Published by Grand Central Pub - 1/1/1992

Follows the outrageous singer-actress Cee Cee Bloom as she attempts to cope with her stardom and being a mother to Bertie's little girl, Nina

Beaches

written byIris Rainer Dart

Published by Bantam - 1/1/1986

A friendship is marked by thirty years of drama, joy & shattering tragedy.

Til the Real Thing Comes Along

written byIris Rainer Dart

Published by Hachette UK - 10/31/2009

Iris Rainer Dart, bestselling author of Beaches, brings you a hilarious, semiautobiographical story about a wary thirty-seven-year-old lady and a gorgeous younger man who's stealing her heart.

Show Business Kills

written byIris Rainer Dart

Published by Hachette UK - 9/26/2009

In this pulse-pounding read, a hard-driving movie executive, a beloved soap opera diva, a screenwriter nominated for an Oscar, and a well-known actress married to TV's King of Late Night face the fight of their lives when a stalker tests their lifelong friendship. Four friends, who have led a charmed in Hollywood, are facing middle age. They have always shared a "Girl's Night Out" but suddenly, it becomes a painful vigil as three of the four watch their friend fight for her life in an intensive care unit. She has been attacked by a stalker who is obsessed with all four women. Will the bonds of friendship that have linked them together for years enable them to survive this chilling night?

Did you know that the movie Beaches is based on the book Beaches?

When the New York child performer CC Bloom and San Francisco rich kid Hillary meet in a holiday resort in Atlantic City, it marks the start of a lifetime friendship between them. The two keep in touch through letters for a number of years until Hillary, now a successful lawyer moves to New York to stay with struggling singer CC. The movie shows the various stages of their friendship and their romances including their love for the same man.
